article_title: Tiny Robot Uses Da Vinci Surgical System On Grape, Illustrates The Future Of Medicine
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: tiny, robot, uses, da, vinci, surgical, system, grape, illustrates, future, medicine

og.description: With the help of two tiny clawed hands, a wounded grape is now on its way toward full recovery.
